title: Hyderabad Metro launches electronics and technology mall ‘in tune with city’s tech DNA’ - The Indian Express
content: Hyderabad Metro launches electronics and technology mall ‘in tune with city’s tech DNA’  The Indian Express
description: Attached to the Hi-Tec City metro station through a skywalk, e-Galleria is promised to be a one-stop hub for the tech-savvy to not only experience emerging technologies but also have a good time because it also has a shopping mall and a food court.
